title: Hour 3 – Bucky Brooks (07-10-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 – Bucky Brooks (07-10-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss some of the risks for college football players in 2020 and some of the downfalls of potentially have no games in 2020. Rob argues Patrick Mahomes made a mistake by not getting a fully guaranteed contract while Doug disagrees. NFL Network analyst Bucky Brooks joins the show to explain why he thinks Cam Newton will succeed in New England this season.  


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
